Name: Beautiful Model2
About the game: ·This is a simulation rope art photography game. Players in the game play a rope master, through the cooperation with beautiful models to shoot beautiful photography. ·This work uses unity3d URP rendering pipeline, eyelashes are clear and visible, compared with the previous work, it can be said that it is a technical explosion! ·This work has independently developed a set of pose design system. Players can control the whole body bones of the character and pose any pose by simple dragging. The disabled hand party can choose the preset posture. ·The binding system simulates the real binding process, and takes out the rope to aim at the target position after the pose is put in place! It's easy to operate and gives a very real feeling. It's very good to substitute. In short, how to bind in reality is how to bind in the game, instead of just clicking the button to display the rope model. ·Clothes in the game include hair style, dress, top, bottom, socks, shoes and accessories. The variety is rich, which can meet the preferences of most players. Under the buff support of URP pipeline, the clothing is particularly lifelike. Developers take the essence to discard their dross, and design 30 expressions to express the passions and emotions of the characters. ·Although the heroine is naturally beautiful, we do not forget to add the icing on the cake. We have designed 8 kinds of make-up looks, such as intellectuality, gentleness, sexuality, enchantment, etc., which make the heroine more changeable. ·In a word, if you like rope art photography, it's a game you can't miss! ·Disclaimer: all characters in the game have reached the age of 18.
